articles.description: As younger sets of people get cleared for inoculation, the county does not know how many doses to expect or whether coronavirus infections will surge again.
articles.content:
As Marin County prepares to expand the pool of people eligible for coronavirus vaccines, health officials are hoping for an increase in supply to meet the surge in demand.
